p:
Aedes albopictus has been first introduced in Europe in 1979 in Albania
24 and again, in Italy in 1990
25 . The species is present in 20 European countries
26 . Several studies using different genetic markers showed collectively a limited genetic differentiation among geographically distant populations reinforcing the recent invasion of the species mostly associated with human activities in mediating Ae. albopictus dispersal
22, 27, 28 .
